page.title: 06Southampton,Children's Games
page.content:
{ Outdoor Games Survey.}
We had to do a survey on games children play outside,to try to see which is the most popular outdoor game. So we went round the whole school, and picked 3 boys and 3 girls from every class and asked them what their most favourite outdoor game was.{Football}was first favourite,{skipping}was second favourite, and{rounders}was third . Netball was fourth favourite and running was fifth favourite.British Bulldog, Cops and Robbers ,War, Leapfrog, cricket and tennis were liked by 2 people each. Horse Riding, Sticky Toffee, Hide n Seek, Marbles, Kiss Chase and bike riding were all liked by 1 person each.
